replies.body:
It's a real shame to see Storm demoted. He's been a really good friend of mine for a long time now. It was a real honor to work with him again on the staff team. We met way back on MCZone. I remember immediately talking to him and hitting it off. We worked along side each other for quite some time on the staff team. As I made my stupid mistakes that ultimately lead to my demotion, Storm continued his career. Throughout the entire incident and conflict he remained a very good friend of mine. As time went on, we spread apart. He gained new friends as I ultimately left gaming for a large time. Once I finally returned, he was the first person I talked to. There was nothing better than reuniting with my long lost buddy. As my Avicus journey lifted off and I received the junior moderator rank, it felt great. One of the things I looked forward to the most was to be back with my pal. 

I'm going to be honest here, I really don't cry too much when it comes to gaming. I've had my moments where I feel down because something "tragic" has happened. When I heard of his demotion, it was like nothing before. I genuinely felt blue. I was extremely upset and I was at a loss for words. 

Servers grow and change. Although some players may not like change, in the end it's for the best. Although he's no longer a staff member, that's not going to change him and/or his legacy. He's still one of the nicest, friendliest guys I know.

I'm going to miss you buddy.

replies.body:
Ah, Storm. I remember seeing him quite a bit back in MCZone. The memories, probably a lot more for the people that got to know him better than me. But please, keep in touch with us on the forums, and don't leave us entirely.  It won't be the same without you, but we all have to move on someday. It's been a wonderful time getting to know you.

It's tough saying goodbye to you. We're going to miss you Storm.

http://imgur.com/IWlFUWN,OXb96LW#0
http://imgur.com/IWlFUWN,OXb96LW#1
